name: Grim Tales Server Mod
description:
Server Mod for Grim Tales server.
-Balances all weapons and armor to DLC levels, removes special effects.
-Pacifies pets and thralls.
-Adds recipes for EE/DMT items.
-Adds some new items.
-Adds thrall recipes to players.
changeNote:
-Balanced one shortsword and one 2h axe that escaped nerf
-Balanced new dual wield axe weapons
-Balanced two boots that escaped nerf
-Added pet goat recipe
-Removed a few weapon destructible meshes to potentially help log spam
author: Grim Tales
